title: Two accomplices of gangster ’Beral Sanka’ shot dead in Kadawatha
body_lines: Two accomplices of underworld gangster 'Beral Sanka' have been shot dead last night at 9th miles post in Kadawatha on the Colombo-Kandy Main Road.
Police said the victims were travelling on a motorcycle when they were gunned down by two shooters with T56 assault rifle who also arrived in a motorcycle.
The victims aged 30 and 31, residents of Peliyagoda had died after admission to the Colombo National Hospital.
Police investigations revealed that a rivalry between two underworld gangs is the reason of the shooting.
